oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Tall Tales - #27 - 'Battle of Stones River'
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: WSM program Tall Tales, episode #27. Featuring the tale 'Battle Of Stones River', written by Bill Woolsey, produced by Marjorie Cooney, with ballad singer George Grise. Original broadcast date of April 27, 1954.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: George Grise
